scripts.dist: cd ../client/ && npm install && npm run prebuild && npm run build
scripts.quickstart: cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run production
scripts.start: npm install && npm run dist && npm run production
scripts.client: cd ../client/ && npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run serve
scripts.server: npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 nodemon --exec node ./bin/www
